page.title: 04Shopping in Five Oak Green
page.content: In our village centre there are two general grocery shops,"The Supply Stores and Post Office"and "The Village Store". Mr.and Mrs.Pearce,who run this, say that their best selling item is sweets.Other goods they sell are groceries,homecare products,fruit and tinned pet food. There used to be a bakery,which is now Capel Canoes,a butcher and a green grocers. Now vans deliver fresh fish, green groceries,fish and chips and videos.People once did most of their shopping in the village.Now they go to supermarkets in Tunbridge Wells, Tonbridge and Paddock Wood.We use Tonbridge and Paddock Wood shops,but buy our papers, bread and milk locally if we run out. Most people have their milk and papers delivered and a few years ago bread was also delivered.
